metadata.title: CVE-2017-11328 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
Heap buffer overflow in the yr_object_array_set_item() function in object.cin YARA 3.x allows a denial-of-service attack by scanning a crafted .NETfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara9 - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
yara - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
